about_us: As a school committed to excellence, we will educate and inspire our students to be responsible, productive and ethical world citizens with the skills and passion for thinking creatively, reasoning critically, communicating effectively and continuously learning. We will accomplish this in an American and British educational environment characterized by high measurable standards and a clearly defined, appropriately interrelated college preparatory curriculum implemented by an exceptional staff in partnership with students, parents, and the community.
terms_text2: Thank you for your interest in enrolling your son / daughter at Nile Valley School. By completing this form you're indicating that you're interested in making an application for your child's enrollment at NVS or that you would like your child's name to be placed on NVS waiting list.
terms_text3: Later in time, you will also be asked to submit other necessary application requirements to support your child application (previous reports, reference letter and/or other documentations).
terms_text4: Completion of this application does not guarantee acceptance.
re_terms_text1: Dear Valued Students and Parents, Thank you for your interest in Nile Valley School. We at NVS, with ultimate sincerity, invest in embedding in our students the allurement for Knowledge, the pearl of life, coupled with sensitivity to ethics and devotion to excellence.
re_terms_text2: This is to confirm that I wish to register my child/ren as student(s) at Nile Valley School for the Academic Year 2023/2024.
re_terms_text3: Kindly note that the school will only re-enroll your child/ren if there are no outstanding fee balances.
re_terms_text4: To progress with the re-enrolment process, 500$ Holding fee (non-refundable), deducted from the Tuition Fees, is currently due and must be paid before April 13th 2023.
title: Title
req_last_attend_phone: Last attended school phone number is required.
req_last_attend_email: Last attended school email is required.
req_last_attend_email_valid: Last attended school email not valid.
